        <script type="text/javascript">
         function computeScrollHeight() {
					var height = jQuery(window).height();
					jQuery("#tagListWrapper").css({height: height-210, overflow:"auto", "overflow-x": "hidden"});
				}
				jQuery( document ).ready(function() {
					computeScrollHeight();
					jQuery( window ).resize(function() {
						computeScrollHeight();
					});
				});
        </script>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       function getStatsForThemeMiniStats() {
		// Call ajax request only if data is not here.
		if ($("#upv_45320").text() == "Loading..." ) {
			jQuery.getJSON("/stats/theme/45320?view=json", function(json){
				jQuery("#upv_45320").empty();
				if (json.stats &amp;&amp; json.stats.uniqueVisitors &gt;= 0) {
					jQuery("#upv_45320").append(json.stats.uniqueVisitors);				
				} else {
					jQuery("#upv_45320").append("Not available");
				}
			});
		}
	}
      </script>

   </div>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    var themeActionsBanner = null;
	jQuery(document).ready(function() {
		themeActionsBanner = jQuery("#theme-actions-banner");
		jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
			if(parseInt(jQuery(this).scrollTop(), 10) &gt; 51) {
				themeActionsBanner.addClass("theme-actions-banner-fixed");
				jQuery("#admin-stuff").css("top", "41px");
			} else {
				themeActionsBanner.removeClass("theme-actions-banner-fixed");
				jQuery("#admin-stuff").css("top", "10px");
			}
		});
	});
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    var logoContainer;
		var infosContainer;
		var logoToHome;
		jQuery(document).ready(function() {
			logoContainer = jQuery(".headSection.head-section-logo");
			infosContainer = jQuery(".headSection.head-section-infos");

			logoToHome = jQuery("#logoToHome", logoContainer);
			//makes the logo Rumble
			logoToHome.jrumble({
				x: 0,
				y: 0,
				rotation: 4,
				speed: 75
			});
			logoToHome.hover(function() {
				var logo = $(this);
				logo.trigger('startRumble');
				// Stop 500ms after
				setTimeout(function() {
					logo.trigger('stopRumble');
				}, 500);
			}, function(){
				$(this).trigger('stopRumble');
			});
		});
   </script>

       jQuery(document).ready(function() {

                jQuery('.post-htmlfragment script[src*="http://player.espn.com"]').not('#thePostToPrint .post-htmlfragment script[src*="http://player.espn.com"]').parent().css("visibility", "hidden");
            }
        });

												&lt;div  id="postTitle_4000701767"  class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" &gt;
																		&lt;h1 class="h2 postTitleView" itemprop="name" &gt;&lt;a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z9ptOeByLA4&amp;feature=youtu.be" onclick="trackPostClick(4000701767 ,{addClick:'popupPostClickOnTitle', hasRelatedPosts: 'false'}); return true;" target="_blank"  rel="nofollow"  class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title"&gt;
													        	    								        					          		Evolving Soft Robots with Multiple Materials (muscle, bone, etc.)
		        			                  
			          	
								        &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h1&gt;   
			        			    &lt;/div&gt;

			    &lt;div class="post-content  clearfix  " &gt;
			    			    			    				    					    	&lt;div class="post-htmlfragment htmlfragment" &gt;
				    						    					    						    			&lt;object width="450" height="253"&gt; &lt;param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/z9ptOeByLA4?fs=1&amp;hl=fr_FR"&gt;&lt;/param&gt; &lt;param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"&gt;&lt;/param&gt; &lt;param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"&gt;&lt;/param&gt; &lt;embed wmode="opaque" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/z9ptOeByLA4?fs=1&amp;hl=fr_FR" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="450" height="253"&gt;&lt;/embed&gt;&lt;/object&gt;
				    	&lt;/div&gt;
			    				    				    				    		&lt;meta itemprop="thumbnailUrl" content="http://img.scoop.it/z1bof9sNHWvnpXabyZRAoIXXXL4j3HpexhjNOf_P3YmryPKwJ94QGRtDb3Sbc6KY" /&gt;
			    				    			    
				&lt;div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;"&gt;
											From
										
				    							   			    &lt;a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z9ptOeByLA4&amp;feature=youtu.be"  onclick="trackPostClick(4000701767,{addClick:'popupPostClickOnDomain', hasRelatedPosts: 'false'}); return true;" target="_blank"  rel="nofollow" &gt;
		   			    	www&lt;wbr/&gt;.youtube&lt;wbr/&gt;.com
		   			    &lt;/a&gt;
		   			    												-										&lt;span  &gt;
					    					        &lt;a href="/t/science-news/p/4000701767/2013/04/28/evolving-soft-robots-with-multiple-materials-muscle-bone-etc"&gt;April 28, 2013 6:40 AM&lt;/a&gt;
					    					&lt;/span&gt;
				&lt;/div&gt;	
			    					&lt;div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse"  &gt;
						&lt;div id="postDescription_4000701767" itemprop="description"  class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description"&gt;
						
									                        		                        			                            &lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;Here we evolve the bodies of soft robots made of multiple materials (muscle, bone, &amp; support tissue) to move quickly. Evolution produces a diverse array of fun, wacky, interesting, but ultimately functional soft robots. Enjoy!&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
		                        		                        		                        		    	                    		                        	                        	                        
					    &lt;/div&gt;
				    &lt;/div&gt;
				    			    			    
			    &lt;/div&gt;
			    
			    			    
			    			&lt;/div&gt;

   <script type="text/javascript">
    jQuery(document).ready(function() {
        	jQuery("body").append(jQuery("#viewboxOverlay"));
        	jQuery("#allPage").prepend(jQuery("#thePostToPrintOverlay"));
            jQuery("#viewboxOverlay").height(jQuery(document).height()); 
            jQuery(window).load(function() {
                jQuery("#viewboxOverlay").height(jQuery(document).height()); 
            });
            var thePostToPrintHasBeenClosed=false;
			jQuery("body").click(function(e) {
				onclickbody(e);
			});
			
			function onclickbody(e) {
								if(thePostToPrintHasBeenClosed){
										return;
				}
			
								var target = null;
				if (e != null){
					target = jQuery(e.target);
				}
								if (target == null || target.parents(".related-scoops").length===0 
						&amp;&amp; target.parents(".feedbackBannerContent").length===0 
						&amp;&amp; target.parents("#headbanner").length===0 
						&amp;&amp; target.parents("#moreInfoBlock").length === 0 
						&amp;&amp; target.parents("#thePostToPrint").length === 0 
						&amp;&amp; target.parents(".simplemodal-data").length === 0
						&amp;&amp; target.parents("#leadgen-container").length === 0
						&amp;&amp; !target.hasClass("simplemodal-overlay") 
						&amp;&amp; !target.hasClass("simplemodal-data") 
						&amp;&amp; !target.hasClass("simplemodal-close")) {
					closePostAndViewTopic(4000701767, "/t/science-news", 45320, "http://www.scoop.it/t/science-news/p/4000701767/2013/04/28/evolving-soft-robots-with-multiple-materials-muscle-bone-etc", '/t/science-news',  null , 'false', 'Science News | Scoop.it');
					thePostToPrintHasBeenClosed = true;
				}
			}
			jQuery("#thePostToPrint .htmlfragment").show();                
            
        });
   </script>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003988411">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://blogs.discovermagazine.com/d-brief/2013/06/20/applause-contagious-like-a-disease/#.UdATzGL0GSo" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988411 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Applause is Contagious Like a Disease - D-brief
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://blogs.discovermagazine.com/d-brief/2013/06/20/applause-contagious-like-a-disease/#.UdATzGL0GSo" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988411); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Applause is Contagious Like a Disease - D-brief | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="312" id="postImage_4003988411" src="http://img.scoop.it/NxsLrgQdiMXbPVowI2Ke4jl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:467; height: 312;" width="467"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://blogs.discovermagazine.com/d-brief/2013/06/20/applause-contagious-like-a-disease/#.UdATzGL0GSo" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988411); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                blogs
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .discovermagazine
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003988411/2013/06/30/applause-is-contagious-like-a-disease-d-brief">
                 June 30, 2013 4:31 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003988411">
                <blockquote>
                 Applause spreads linearly, like a disease. The amount of time an individual feels like clapping is a factor, but not nearly as much as peer pressure.
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003988236">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://earthsky.org/earth/cicada-wings-inspire-new-ideas-for-antibacterial-products" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988236 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Cicada wings inspire new ideas for antibacterial products
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://earthsky.org/earth/cicada-wings-inspire-new-ideas-for-antibacterial-products" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988236); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Cicada wings inspire new ideas for antibacterial products | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="161" id="postImage_4003988236" src="http://img.scoop.it/4EmKLtXFykxnhaM4mo8apTl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 161;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://earthsky.org/earth/cicada-wings-inspire-new-ideas-for-antibacterial-products" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988236); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                earthsky
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .org
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003988236/2013/06/30/cicada-wings-inspire-new-ideas-for-antibacterial-products">
                 June 30, 2013 4:08 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003988236">
                <blockquote>
                 Heres another reason to love cicadas: A new study has found that tiny structures on cicada wings can kill bacteria through physical and not chemical means.
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003988207">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://physics.aps.org/articles/v6/70" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988207 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                How to Learn a Language Quickly
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://physics.aps.org/articles/v6/70" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988207); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="How to Learn a Language Quickly | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="271" id="postImage_4003988207" src="http://img.scoop.it/bvlyynCn6jUTzpBhFDw95Tl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:467; height: 271;" width="467"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://physics.aps.org/articles/v6/70" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988207); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                physics
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .aps
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .org
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003988207/2013/06/30/how-to-learn-a-language-quickly">
                 June 30, 2013 4:05 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003988207">
                <blockquote>
                 Simulations show that you can learn the meaning of words rapidly if you assume that every object has only one word associated with it.
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003987500">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.nature.com/news/plants-perform-molecular-maths-1.13251" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987500 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Plants perform molecular maths
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.nature.com/news/plants-perform-molecular-maths-1.13251" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987500); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Plants perform molecular maths | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="286" id="postImage_4003987500" src="http://img.scoop.it/ZGoUIwwhrS8tkZFI2PTO-jl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:467; height: 286;" width="467"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.nature.com/news/plants-perform-molecular-maths-1.13251" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987500); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                www
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .nature
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987500/2013/06/30/plants-perform-molecular-maths">
                 June 30, 2013 3:58 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987500">
                <blockquote>
                 Arithmetic division guides plants' use of energy at night.
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="post-curation-comment tCustomization tCustomization_post_comment_curation decorated ">
              <div class="post-curation-comment-title">
               Sakis Koukouvis's insight:
              </div>
              <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description">
               <p>
                <span>
                 As if making food from light were not impressive enough, it may be time to add another advanced skill to the botanical repertoire: the ability to perform  at least at the molecular level  arithmetic division.
                </span>
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="post-bottom post-bottom-anonymous ">

                 </fb:like>
                </span>

              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://phenomena.nationalgeographic.com/2013/06/21/listening-to-the-genome-music-or-noise/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988139 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Listening to the Genome: Music or Noise?
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://phenomena.nationalgeographic.com/2013/06/21/listening-to-the-genome-music-or-noise/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988139); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Listening to the Genome: Music or Noise? | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="86" id="postImage_4003988139" src="http://img.scoop.it/1emjWDTwyu0rQhQqKJcdXTl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 86;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://phenomena.nationalgeographic.com/2013/06/21/listening-to-the-genome-music-or-noise/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988139); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">

                <wbr>

                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                c
                <wbr>
                </wbr>

               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003988139">
                <blockquote>
                 One of the great triumphs of twentieth-century biology was the discovery of how genes make proteins. Genes are encoded in DNA. To turn the sequence of a gene into a protein, a number of molecules g...
                </blockquote>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003988065">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.nature.com/news/how-do-you-sleep-1.13264" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988065 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                How do you sleep?
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.nature.com/news/how-do-you-sleep-1.13264" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988065); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">

                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.nature.com/news/how-do-you-sleep-1.13264" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988065); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">

               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003988065">

                </blockquote>

               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003987320">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://news.science360.gov/obj/story/cffa0247-fff4-49e5-a40d-4ce7c12ac48e/fastest-articulated-motion-human-execute" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987320 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                What Is The Fastest Articulated Motion A Human Can Execute?
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://news.science360.gov/obj/story/cffa0247-fff4-49e5-a40d-4ce7c12ac48e/fastest-articulated-motion-human-execute" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987320); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="What Is The Fastest Articulated Motion A Human Can Execute? | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="168" id="postImage_4003987320" src="http://img.scoop.it/8JZlvgGBgHo4FHdKzsFbWTl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 168;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://news.science360.gov/obj/story/cffa0247-fff4-49e5-a40d-4ce7c12ac48e/fastest-articulated-motion-human-execute" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987320); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                news
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .science360
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .gov
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987320/2013/06/30/what-is-the-fastest-articulated-motion-a-human-can-execute">
                 June 30, 2013 3:29 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987320">
                <blockquote>
                 Humans are able to throw projectiles at incredible speeds. Findings from a recent study are providing new insights on the mechanics and evolution of this human trait.
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003332122">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.sciencerecorder.com/news/scientists-discover-the-secret-of-whales-and-dolphins-astonishing-diving-power/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003332122 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Scientists discover the secret of whales and dolphins astonishing diving power
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.sciencerecorder.com/news/scientists-discover-the-secret-of-whales-and-dolphins-astonishing-diving-power/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003332122); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Scientists discover the secret of whales and dolphins astonishing diving power | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="121" id="postImage_4003332122" src="http://img.scoop.it/k585skwZ_npeAGe_fSAplzl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 121;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.sciencerecorder.com/news/scientists-discover-the-secret-of-whales-and-dolphins-astonishing-diving-power/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003332122); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                www
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .sciencerecorder
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003332122/2013/06/29/scientists-discover-the-secret-of-whales-and-dolphins-astonishing-diving-power">
                 June 29, 2013 11:43 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">

                <blockquote>
                 Scientists crack the code of mammalian breathing.
                </blockquote>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003712900">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-22991838" onclick="trackPostClick(4003712900 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Plants 'do maths', scientists say
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-22991838" onclick="trackPostClick(4003712900); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Plants 'do maths', scientists say | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="126" id="postImage_4003712900" src="http://img.scoop.it/zk_kaHk7cB2f_0URe18SCDl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 126;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-22991838" onclick="trackPostClick(4003712900); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                www
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .bbc
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .co
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .uk
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003712900/2013/06/29/plants-do-maths-scientists-say">
                 June 29, 2013 11:43 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003712900">
                <blockquote>
                 Plants have a built-in capacity to do maths, which helps them regulate food reserves in the night, say UK scientists.
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://news.nationalgeographic.com/news/2013/06/130613-antarctic-sea-ice-shelf-melt-glacier-ocean-science/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003219335 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Antarctic's Ice Shelves Melting From the Bottom Up
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://news.nationalgeographic.com/news/2013/06/130613-antarctic-sea-ice-shelf-melt-glacier-ocean-science/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003219335); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Antarctic's Ice Shelves Melting From the Bottom Up | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="149" id="postImage_4003219335" src="http://img.scoop.it/MV6Q9kLbWeobzp3S68v5rjl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 149;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://news.nationalgeographic.com/news/2013/06/130613-antarctic-sea-ice-shelf-melt-glacier-ocean-science/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003219335); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                news
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .nationalgeographi
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                c
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003219335/2013/06/13/antarctic-s-ice-shelves-melting-from-the-bottom-up">
                 June 13, 2013 1:58 PM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003219335">
                <blockquote>
                 Ice shelves lose more mass through melting where the ice meets the sea than by shedding icebergs, a new study says.
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003988283">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.technologyreview.com/view/516301/demographers-discover-the-fundamental-law-governing-the-growth-of-cities/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988283 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Demographers Discover The Fundamental Law Governing the Growth of Cities Discovered
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.technologyreview.com/view/516301/demographers-discover-the-fundamental-law-governing-the-growth-of-cities/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988283); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Demographers Discover The Fundamental Law Governing the Growth of Cities Discovered | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="211" id="postImage_4003988283" src="http://img.scoop.it/JBYJr2hnsDI_IIEQAyoHpzl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:467; height: 211;" width="467"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.technologyreview.com/view/516301/demographers-discover-the-fundamental-law-governing-the-growth-of-cities/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003988283); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                www
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .technologyreview
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003988283/2013/06/30/demographers-discover-the-fundamental-law-governing-the-growth-of-cities-discovered">
                 June 30, 2013 4:14 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003988283">
                <blockquote>
                 <em>
                  <strong>
                   The discovery of a law governing the growth of cities means that future urban populations can now be forecast in advance
                  </strong>
                 </em>
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>

              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://arstechnica.com/science/2013/06/cassini-captures-gigantic-hurricane-on-saturn-in-exquisite-detail/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987575 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Cassini captures gigantic hurricane on Saturn in exquisite detail
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://arstechnica.com/science/2013/06/cassini-captures-gigantic-hurricane-on-saturn-in-exquisite-detail/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987575); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Cassini captures gigantic hurricane on Saturn in exquisite detail | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="467" id="postImage_4003987575" src="http://img.scoop.it/2UboAtJHYjPxt1zmDp6Mgzl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:467; height: 467;" width="467"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://arstechnica.com/science/2013/06/cassini-captures-gigantic-hurricane-on-saturn-in-exquisite-detail/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987575); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                arstechnica
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987575/2013/06/30/cassini-captures-gigantic-hurricane-on-saturn-in-exquisite-detail">
                 June 30, 2013 4:07 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987575">
                <blockquote>
                 Features of Saturn's Great White Spot as small as 14 km were imaged.
                </blockquote>
               </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003987543">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.newscientist.com/article/dn23740-new-signs-of-language-surface-in-mystery-voynich-text.html#.UdAQV2L0GSp" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987543 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                New signs of language surface in mystery Voynich text
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.newscientist.com/article/dn23740-new-signs-of-language-surface-in-mystery-voynich-text.html#.UdAQV2L0GSp" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987543); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="New signs of language surface in mystery Voynich text | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="171" id="postImage_4003987543" src="http://img.scoop.it/CbMljlFfQVPvU2IBc0nisTl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 171;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.newscientist.com/article/dn23740-new-signs-of-language-surface-in-mystery-voynich-text.html#.UdAQV2L0GSp" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987543); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                www
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .newscientist
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987543/2013/06/30/new-signs-of-language-surface-in-mystery-voynich-text">
                 June 30, 2013 4:03 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987543">
                <blockquote>
                 Some had dismissed the unknown script in a mysterious 15th-century illustrated text as gibberish, but statistical analysis indicates it could be a cipher
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003987493">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.mccormick.northwestern.edu/news/articles/2013/06/how-fish-swim-mccormick-researchers-examine-mechanical-bases-for-the-emergence-of-undulatory-swimmers.html" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987493 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                How Fish Swim
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.mccormick.northwestern.edu/news/articles/2013/06/how-fish-swim-mccormick-researchers-examine-mechanical-bases-for-the-emergence-of-undulatory-swimmers.html" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987493); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="How Fish Swim | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="262" id="postImage_4003987493" src="http://img.scoop.it/_C-6QwY2IXYGViVcCiuTRjl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:467; height: 262;" width="467"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.mccormick.northwestern.edu/news/articles/2013/06/how-fish-swim-mccormick-researchers-examine-mechanical-bases-for-the-emergence-of-undulatory-swimmers.html" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987493); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                www
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .mccormick
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .northwestern
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .edu
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987493/2013/06/30/how-fish-swim">
                 June 30, 2013 3:57 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987493">
                <p>
                 <span>
                  Researchers have revealed some of the mechanical properties that allow undulatory fish to move so intricately, including vorticity (shown above), the rotational velocity of the fluid in the wake of the swimming fish.
                 </span>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003987419">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://blogs.scientificamerican.com/anthropology-in-practice/2013/06/26/what-does-it-mean-when-we-need-to-take-a-break-from-facebook/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987419 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                What does it mean when we need to take a break from Facebook?
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://blogs.scientificamerican.com/anthropology-in-practice/2013/06/26/what-does-it-mean-when-we-need-to-take-a-break-from-facebook/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987419); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="What does it mean when we need to take a break from Facebook? | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="226" id="postImage_4003987419" src="http://img.scoop.it/K_qwbyZQ13u0OtxcBlUAHjl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 226;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://blogs.scientificamerican.com/anthropology-in-practice/2013/06/26/what-does-it-mean-when-we-need-to-take-a-break-from-facebook/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987419); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                blogs
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .scientificamerica
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                n
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987419/2013/06/30/what-does-it-mean-when-we-need-to-take-a-break-from-facebook">
                 June 30, 2013 3:45 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987419">
                <p>
                 <span>
                  The future of Facebook in our lives seems long-term. Facebook reports 1.11 billion monthly active users as of March 2013. Thats a lot of information being passed back and forth, a lot to absorb and respond to, and a lot to curate. As such, more people may find themselves taking a break from daily engagement with the sitesometimes you just need a break from Candy Crush Saga requests.
                 </span>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

                 </fb:like>
                </span>

              <div class="rescoop">
               <div class="button button-rescoop default " onclick="showSignupPopup(null, null, '?rescoop=4003987359');return false;" x-data-rescoop-onclick="showPostInScoopitWindow('/t/science-news/p/4003987359/2013/06/30/researchers-use-video-game-tech-to-steer-roaches-on-autopilot/rescoop/2', null)">
                <img src="/resources/img/post/icon_rescoop.png"/>
                <span>
                 Scoop.it!

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003987359">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://news.ncsu.edu/releases/wms-bozkurt-roach-autopilot/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987359 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Researchers Use Video Game Tech to Steer Roaches on Autopilot
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://news.ncsu.edu/releases/wms-bozkurt-roach-autopilot/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987359); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Researchers Use Video Game Tech to Steer Roaches on Autopilot | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="290" id="postImage_4003987359" src="http://img.scoop.it/N3CszML1Uzp6vE2peDoJ2Tl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 290;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://news.ncsu.edu/releases/wms-bozkurt-roach-autopilot/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987359); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                news
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .ncsu
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .edu
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987359/2013/06/30/researchers-use-video-game-tech-to-steer-roaches-on-autopilot">
                 June 30, 2013 3:35 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987359">
                <p>
                 North Carolina State University researchers are using video game technology to remotely control cockroaches on autopilot, with a computer steering the cockroach through a controlled environment. The researchers are using the technology to track how roaches respond to the remote control, with the goal of developing ways that roaches on autopilot can be used to map dynamic environments  such as collapsed buildings.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="post-bottom post-bottom-anonymous ">

                 </fb:like>
                </span>
                <span class="share-button share-button-tw" data-location="bottomOfPost" data-unshortenurl="http://www.scoop.it/t/science-news/p/4003987359/2013/06/30/researchers-use-video-game-tech-to-steer-roaches-on-autopilot">
                 <a data-text="Researchers Use Video Game Tech to Steer Roaches on Autopilot" data-url="http://sco.lt/82cdKT" data-via="scoopit" href="https://twitter.com/share">

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003987287">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.technologyreview.com/view/516406/fairy-circle-mystery-solved-by-computational-modelling/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987287 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Fairy Circle Mystery Solved By Computational Modelling
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.technologyreview.com/view/516406/fairy-circle-mystery-solved-by-computational-modelling/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987287); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Fairy Circle Mystery Solved By Computational Modelling | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="316" id="postImage_4003987287" src="http://img.scoop.it/YU7zvP6cx0RcvEuN7WD1fDl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:467; height: 316;" width="467"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.technologyreview.com/view/516406/fairy-circle-mystery-solved-by-computational-modelling/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987287); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                www
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .technologyreview
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987287/2013/06/30/fairy-circle-mystery-solved-by-computational-modelling">
                 June 30, 2013 3:24 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987287">
                <blockquote>
                 The explanation of the mysterious barren circles that form in the middle of fertile grasslands hints that similar circles may show up in other systems, say complexity scientists
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.popsci.com/science/article/2013-06/oh-baby-research-finds-infants-recognize-each-others-emotions" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987237 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Babies Recognize Each Other's Moods, Study Says
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.popsci.com/science/article/2013-06/oh-baby-research-finds-infants-recognize-each-others-emotions" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987237); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Babies Recognize Each Other's Moods, Study Says | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="156" id="postImage_4003987237" src="http://img.scoop.it/7tz2QrNEIr2CUt0QFwGrDjl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 156;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.popsci.com/science/article/2013-06/oh-baby-research-finds-infants-recognize-each-others-emotions" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987237); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                www
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .popsci
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987237/2013/06/30/babies-recognize-each-other-s-moods-study-says">
                 June 30, 2013 3:15 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987237">
                <blockquote>
                 When I used to babysit my infant niece, I often panicked when she started to cry. Was she hungry? Tired? Cold? In need of a diaper change? I struggled to
                </blockquote>
               </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003987194">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://news.ncsu.edu/releases/wms-boyer-expression-2013/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987194 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Researchers Track Facial Expressions To Improve Teaching Software
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://news.ncsu.edu/releases/wms-boyer-expression-2013/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987194); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Researchers Track Facial Expressions To Improve Teaching Software | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="212" id="postImage_4003987194" src="http://img.scoop.it/dGFOrujSKlRJKXV47HlqnTl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 212;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://news.ncsu.edu/releases/wms-boyer-expression-2013/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003987194); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                news
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .ncsu
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .edu
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003987194/2013/06/30/researchers-track-facial-expressions-to-improve-teaching-software">
                 June 30, 2013 3:10 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003987194">
                <p>
                 Research from North Carolina State University shows that software which tracks facial expressions can accurately assess the emotions of students engaged in interactive online learning and predict the effectiveness of online tutoring sessions.
                 <span>
                 </span>
                </p>
                <div>
                 <br/>
                 <p>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003489323">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.wired.com/wiredscience/2013/05/winter-honeybee-losses/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003489323 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                One-Third of U.S. Honeybee Colonies Died Last Winter, Threatening Food Supply | Wired Science | Wired.com
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.wired.com/wiredscience/2013/05/winter-honeybee-losses/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003489323); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="One-Third of U.S. Honeybee Colonies Died Last Winter, Threatening Food Supply | Wired Science | Wired.com | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="138" id="postImage_4003489323" src="http://img.scoop.it/61dIHfhX6PAhPZx6nr2esTl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 138;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">
               From
               <a href="http://www.wired.com/wiredscience/2013/05/winter-honeybee-losses/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003489323); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                www
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .wired
                <wbr>
                </wbr>
                .com
               </a>
               -
               <span>
                <a href="/t/science-news/p/4003489323/2013/06/29/one-third-of-u-s-honeybee-colonies-died-last-winter-threatening-food-supply-wired-science-wired-com">
                 June 29, 2013 11:43 AM
                </a>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="post-description editable-container tooltip-on-mouse">
               <div class="tCustomization tCustomization_post_description" id="postDescription_4003489323">
                <blockquote>
                 Nearly one in three commercial honeybee colonies in the United States died or disappeared last winter, an unsustainable decline that threatens the nation's food supply and suggests that something is deeply foul in our environment.
                </blockquote>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

                 <a data-text="One-Third of U.S. Honeybee Colonies Died Last Winter, Threatening Food Supply | Wired Science | Wired.com" data-url="http://sco.lt/84tQMz" data-via="scoopit" href="https://twitter.com/share">

													internalUrl:"/t/science-news/p/4003489323/2013/06/29/one-third-of-u-s-honeybee-colonies-died-last-winter-threatening-food-supply-wired-science-wired-com", 
							"whiteLabelSharing": whiteLabelSharing,
							"isStorifyUrl": false
											}
				);
          </script>
         </article>

             <div class="post-title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title editable-container tooltip-on-mouse" id="postTitle_4003232918">
              <h2 class="h2 postTitleView">
               <a class=" title tCustomization tCustomization_post_title" href="http://www.sciencerecorder.com/news/researchers-solve-mystery-of-how-marine-mammals-hold-their-breath/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003232918 ); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                Researchers solve mystery of how marine mammals hold their breath
               </a>
              </h2>
             </div>
             <div class="post-content clearfix ">
              <div class="post-image">
               <a href="http://www.sciencerecorder.com/news/researchers-solve-mystery-of-how-marine-mammals-hold-their-breath/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003232918); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                <div class="thisistherealimage">
                 <img alt="Researchers solve mystery of how marine mammals hold their breath | Science News | Scoop.it" class="postDisplayedImage" height="121" id="postImage_4003232918" src="http://img.scoop.it/K_SHRlLwlQzxKA2XYfVqLDl72eJkfbmt4t8yenImKBVvK0kTmF0xjctABnaLJIm9" style="width:224; height: 121;" width="224"/>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="post-metas tCustomization_post_metas" style="margin-right: 25px; padding-bottom: 5px;">

               <a href="http://www.sciencerecorder.com/news/researchers-solve-mystery-of-how-marine-mammals-hold-their-breath/" onclick="trackPostClick(4003232918); return true;" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">

   window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
    // init the FB JS SDK
    FB.init({
      appId      : '165307520164712', // App ID from the App Dashboard
      channelUrl : '//www.scoop.it', // Channel File for x-domain communication
      status     : true, // check the login status upon init?

      xfbml      : false  // parse XFBML tags on this page?
    });

    		loadVisibleSharers();
	    
    FB.Event.subscribe('edge.create',
        function(response) {
    		var location = jQuery(".fb-like[href='"+response+"']").attr("data-location");
    		trackNativeButtonShare('facebook', location, response);
    	}
    );
};

(function(d, s, id, debug){
    var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
    if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
    js = d.createElement(s); 
    js.id = id;
    js.async=true;
    js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all" + (debug ? "/debug" : "") + ".js";
    fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
  }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk', /*debug*/ false));


window.twttr.ready(function (twttr) {
	loadVisibleSharers();
});

window.twttr.ready(function (twttr) {
	twttr.events.bind('tweet', function(event) {
		var url = jQuery(event.target).parent().attr("data-unshortenUrl");
		var location = jQuery(event.target).parent().attr("data-location");
		trackNativeButtonShare('twitter', location, url);
	});
});

jQuery(function() {
	jQuery.getScript("//platform.linkedin.com/in.js?async=true", function() {IN.init()});
});

function linkedinShareSuccess(e) {
	var location = jQuery(".linkedin-share-button[data-href='"+e+"']").attr("data-location");
	var url = e;
	trackNativeButtonShare('linkedin', location, url);
}




window.___gcfg = {
    parsetags: 'explicit'
};

(function() {
    var po = document.createElement('script'); po.type = 'text/javascript'; po.async = true;
    po.src = 'https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js';
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(po, s);
})();
  
  
function googlePlusTouched(e) {
	if (e.state == "on") {
		var url = e.href;
		var location = "bottomOfPost";
		trackNativeButtonShare('google', location, url);
	}
}


function loadSocialWidgetInAPost(post) {
	if (post.length &gt; 0) {
		//facebook
		if (typeof FB != 'undefined') {
			FB.XFBML.parse(jQuery(".share-button-fb",post)[0]);
			post.addClass("loaded-fb");
		}
		//twitter
		if (typeof twttr != 'undefined') {
			jQuery(".share-button-tw a", post).addClass("twitter-share-button");
			twttr.widgets.load(jQuery(".share-button-tw",post)[0]);
			post.addClass("loaded-tw");
		}
		//G+
		if (typeof gapi != 'undefined') {
			gapi.plusone.go(jQuery(".share-button-gp",post)[0]);
			post.addClass("loaded-gp");
		}
	}
}


function loadVisibleSharers() {
	jQuery(".post").each(function(){
		var elt = jQuery(this);
		if (elt.attr("id") == "topic-tags-widget") {
			return;
		}
		if (elt.hasClass("loaded-tw") &amp;&amp; elt.hasClass("loaded-gp") &amp;&amp; elt.hasClass("loaded-fb")) {return;}
		if (elt.isOnScreen()) {
			loadSocialWidgetInAPost(elt);
		}
	});
}

jQuery(window).bind("resize", function(event) {
	loadVisibleSharers();
});

var scrollingChecker = 0;
function onScroll(event) {
	clearTimeout(scrollingChecker);
	scrollingChecker = setTimeout(onStopScrolling, 300);
}

function onStopScrolling() {
	loadVisibleSharers();
}

jQuery(document).bind("scroll", onScroll);
